timeline.bodyText:
According to http://dresden-elektronik.github.io/deconz-rest-doc/lights/#getstate the range is far more limited to 153-500. We should use that for the range check.



state.ct
Number (153..500)
Mired color temperature of the light. (2000K - 6500K)
timeline.author: J-N-K

replies.bodyText:
I disagree with the proposed value range. I already have a few lights outside of this range, The deconz documentation is wrong here. the range is only limited by the reported range by the light bulb in deconz.
See : deconz rest plugin source code
The Zigbee cluster secificaten defines a valid range for the ct values to be 1 - 65279 mired /  that would be 15 K - 1000000K
You can find that in the spec if you scroll to pdf page 327 is at the bottom.
I don't see any reason to limit the value range other than to the zigbee standard allowed range.
replies.author: HahnBenjamin

replies.bodyText: Ok. We can discuss if we set the range for The dynamic state description to that values if we don‘t receive useful values.
replies.author: J-N-K
